title: Short-Intensive Course for Strengthening Pharmacy Professional Competencies through Discussion-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Real-time discussion classes conducted in a digital device environment.

learning_goals: Learners logically analyze complex pharmaceutical topics and present structured arguments within 3 minutes.
Learners revise initial arguments by over 20% based on peer feedback and produce counterargument materials.
Learners submit notes summarizing key issues raised during discussions with 80% accuracy.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
